title: Coroner: man dies after accidental shooting in Gaston
content:
GASTON, SC (WIS) -
Lexington County Coroner Margaret Fisher said a man died Friday in an accidental shooting in Gaston.
Fisher said Johnny McCarthy, III, 32, of Gaston, died of a from a gunshot wound to his abdomen. The coroner said McCarthy's death is "believed to have been caused by an accidental discharge from a weapon that was in the possession of Mr. McCarthy."
The Lexington County Sheriff’s Department continues to investigate the shooting.
Colby Gallagher, a spokesperson for the department, said the shooting happened just before 2 p.m. Friday on Pineturn Lane.
